overview_of_class: This course provides an introduction to the evolution and current state of the academic literature on American Politics, although there is a clear focus on classic historic readings. Moreover, the course emphasizes breadth over depth (although time constraints prevent us from examining all areas of American politics). The first part of the course focuses on political behavior, while the second part emphasizes political institutions.
name: American Political Institutions and Behavior
subject: POLI_SCI
